title: Atomic Habits
author: James Clear
description: A practical guide to building good habits and breaking bad ones using proven scientific strategies.

title: Deep Work
author: Cal Newport
description: Teaches the value of deep, focused work and how it can help you achieve peak performance.

title: Thinking, Fast and Slow
author: Daniel Kahneman
description: Explores the dual systems of thinking: fast, intuitive decisions and slow, deliberate reasoning.
